mdq:check.name: Entity Identifier Present
mdq:check.description: Check that each entity has an dentifier.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
import java.util.ArrayList as ArrayList import metadig.variable as mvar
# An attribute definition is not present if 'resourceIdentifier' not in globals() or resourceIdentifier is None: output = "A resource identifier was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
# check if the identifier is blank # TODO: check the identifier namespace if (mvar.isBlank(resourceIdentifier)): output = "The resource identifier is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if resource identifier is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(resourceIdentifier, str) or isinstance(resourceIdentifier, unicode)): output = "The resource identifier '{}' was found".format(resourceIdentifier) elif (isinstance(resourceIdentifier, ArrayList)): output = "The resource identifier '{}' was found (first of {} identifiers)".format(resourceIdentifier[0].strip(), resourceIdentifier.size()) else: output = "The resource identifier '{}' was found)".format(resourceIdentifier)
status = "SUCCESS" return True
